item.title: Finance of America Companies Inc S-1
item.description: Finance of America Companies Inc, which is in the Mortgage Bankers & Loan Correspondents [6162] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 25, 2021 had 161582 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 2382 instances loans - 1603 instances mortgage - 1293 instances value - 1286 instances 1 - 1233 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
